author: Cory Fleming
text:
I'm helping to organize an education session entitled, "Between a Rock and a Hard Place," at Annual Conference.  I'm looking for two or three small community managers coming to Milwaukee who would be willing to present a brief case study on how they facilitated a dialogue between elected officials and citizens on a controversial issue.
If you're interested in being a part of this session, please contact me at cfleming@icma.org or call me at 207-854-1083.
title: Between a Rock and a Hard Place
